dta.CountsVsVolumes¶

class CountsVsVolumes(net, path, reverse)¶

Bases: object

Generates corridor plots.

_getIntersectionNamesAndLocations()¶

Return a list of intersection names and intersection locations

_getIntersectionNamesAndLocationsInReverse()¶
getCountsAlongCorridor(startTimeInMin, endTimeInMin)¶

Generator method that returns the edge, left turn and right turn counts for the specified time window along the route

getIntersectionLocations()¶

Return a list of intersection locations along the route

getIntersectionNames()¶

Return a list of the intersection names along the route

getMidLinkLocations()¶

Return a list of link midpoint locations

getMovementVolumesCrossingCorridor(startTimeInMin, endTimeInMin)¶

Return the left and right turn volumes

getVolumesAlongCorridor(startTimeInMin, endTimeInMin)¶

Generator method that returns the edge, leftTurn and right turn volumes for all the links on the route

classmethod iterMovementCountsCrossingRoute(route, startTimeInMin, endTimeInMin)¶

Generator method that yields the left turn and right turn counts on crossing links

classmethod plotEdgeCountsAlongRoute(plot, route, startTimeInMin, endTimeInMin, color)¶

Adds count information to the provided plot

classmethod plotEdgeVolumesAlongRoute(route, startTimeInMin, endTimeInMin, color)¶

Creates a scatterplot with the Y axis representing edges along the route and the x axis representing volumes

Note

Requires pylab module.

writeVolumesVsCounts(startTimeInMin, endTimeInMin, outPlotFileName, svg=False)¶

Export the corridor volume plot to the outPlotFileName. The volumes to be summarized are from startTime to endTime.

Note

Requires pylab module.
